data_table.description: The data table contains mapping of study subject IDs to sample IDs. Samples are the final preps submitted for sequencing. For example, if one patient (subject ID) gave one sample, and that sample was processed differently to generate 2 sequencing runs, there would be two rows, both using the same subject ID, but having 2 unique sample IDs. Also included is sample use.

variable.name: SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID - ID associated with DNA sequence (at WashU - Matrix ID)

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Use of Sample. Seq_DNA_WholeGenome: Whole genome sequencing; Seq_rRNA_16S: 16S rRNA sequencing
